Zipcode: 11436

Borough: Queens

With an average inspection score of 13, one can expect the restaurants in Zipcode 11436 to offer facilities and eating experiences that are slightly worse, on average, than other restaurants in Queens and slightly worse, on average, than other restaurants in NYC.
